name: Lena & Tubs in: The Shattered Chateau
name_original: Lena & Tubs in: The Shattered Chateau
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 49

Lena returns to a haunted mansion from her childhood to learn more about the mystery of her friend’s death but along the way she’ll need the help of Tubs the ghost if she wants to make it out alive.

Rate on LDJam:  https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/lena-tubs-in-the-shattered-chateau
